automatic_ordering.reasoning: The only clear ordering condition is found in the description of 'Combat_FlamingFist_001_DesireDied', which is triggered by fighting S_HAV_FlamingFist_001 after S_GLO_Desire has died. Since 'Combat_Desire' is the session where S_GLO_Desire is fought (and may die), it must occur before 'Combat_FlamingFist_001_DesireDied'. In addition, there are two sessions triggered by fighting S_HAV_FlamingFist_001: one normal ('Combat_FlamingFist_001') and one that occurs only after S_GLO_Desire has died ('Combat_FlamingFist_001_DesireDied'). This implies that these two sessions are mutually exclusive; only one of them will be triggered depending on the status of S_GLO_Desire. The other combat sessions (Combat_FlamingFist_003, Combat_FlamingFist_005, and Combat_FlamingFist_006) do not present any explicit ordering or exclusiveness conditions with respect to other sessions.

Combat_FlamingFist_005_0.speaker: Fist Gretta
Combat_FlamingFist_005_0.text: I'm going home to Baldur's Gate with your blood on my tunic.
